mapper.select: SELECT b.product_id , b.title , b.product_type , b.total_investing_amount , b.started_at , b.finished_at , b.created_time , b.modified_time , b.member_id , b.investor_count , b.now_investing_amount , (CASE WHEN total_investing_amount <= now_investing_amount THEN 'FINISHED' ELSE 'RECRUITING' END) AS investment_recruitment_status FROM ( SELECT tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.member_id , count(ti.member_id) as investor_count , COALESCE(sum(tpi.invested_amount), 0) as now_investing_amount FROM tb_product tp LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product_invest tpi ON tp.product_id = tpi.product_id AND tpi.invest_status = 'SUCCESS' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member ti ON ti.member_id = tpi.member_id WHERE now() BETWEEN started_at AND finished_at group by tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.member_id ) AS b

SELECT b.product_id , b.title , b.product_type , b.total_investing_amount , b.started_at , b.finished_at , b.created_time , b.modified_time , b.member_id , b.investor_count , b.now_investing_amount , (CASE WHEN total_investing_amount <= now_investing_amount THEN 'FINISHED' ELSE 'RECRUITING' END) AS investment_recruitment_status FROM ( SELECT tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.member_id , count(ti.member_id) as investor_count , COALESCE(sum(tpi.invested_amount), 0) as now_investing_amount FROM tb_product tp LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product_invest tpi ON tp.product_id = tpi.product_id AND tpi.invest_status = 'SUCCESS' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member ti ON ti.member_id = tpi.member_id WHERE tp.member_id = #{memberId}::bigint group by tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.member_id ) AS b

SELECT b.product_id , b.title , b.product_type , b.total_investing_amount , b.started_at , b.finished_at , b.created_time , b.modified_time , b.member_id , b.investor_count , b.now_investing_amount , (CASE WHEN total_investing_amount <= now_investing_amount THEN 'FINISHED' ELSE 'RECRUITING' END) AS investment_recruitment_status FROM ( SELECT tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.member_id , count(ti.member_id) as investor_count , COALESCE(sum(tpi.invested_amount), 0) as now_investing_amount FROM tb_product tp LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product_invest tpi ON tp.product_id = tpi.product_id AND tpi.invest_status = 'SUCCESS' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member ti ON ti.member_id = tpi.member_id WHERE tp.product_id = #{productId}::bigint group by tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.member_id ) AS b
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_product WHERE product_id = #{productId}::bigint and started_at > now()
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_product SET title = #{title} , total_investing_amount = #{totalInvestingAmount}::bigint , started_at = #{startedAt}::timestamp , finished_at = #{finishedAt}::timestamp , modified_time = now() WHERE product_id = #{productId}::bigint and started_at > now()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product (title, product_type, total_investing_amount, started_at, finished_at, created_time, modified_time, member_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{productType}::en_product_type, #{totalInvestingAmount}::bigint, #{startedAt}::timestamp, #{finishedAt}::timestamp, now(), now(), #{memberId}::bigint)
